primary.title: Robredo on Anti-Terror Act: ‘Why pass it during pandemic, amid opposition?’
primary.description: MANILA—Vice-President Leni Robredo on Saturday denounced the passage of the anti-terror bill amid calls to scrap the measure while the country continued to grapple with the COVID-19 crisis.
